narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 6-year-old male was last seen at Richmond at 2025-09-28T01:06:26.136062+00:00. The child was reported missing by friend after failing to arrive at school.

narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 3 hours of disappearance, movement cues entered vehicle and headed northbound on I-95 suggest travel northbound along I-264. A dark blue 2012 Toyota Camry was observed departing near Richmond, Virginia.

provenance._fulltext: A 6-year-old male was last seen at Richmond at 2025-09-28T01:06:26.136062+00:00. The child was reported missing by friend after failing to arrive at school. Within 3 hours of disappearance, movement cues entered vehicle and headed northbound on I-95 suggest travel northbound along I-264. A dark blue 2012 Toyota Camry was observed departing near Richmond, Virginia. Around 7 hours later, a school_staff reported someone matching the description (6-year-old male, wearing gray jacket, blue athletic shorts, Spider-Man flip-flops) near Lee.
